syllabus.title: Introduction to Internet Software Development
syllabus.subtitle: COMP4711
syllabus.author: James L. Parry
syllabus.summary: This course is about webapp development, using best practices. In small teams, the students will build a moderate MVC webapp in three phases, each building on the previous one. The teams will collaborate using a shared code repository and gitflow workflow, with appropriate supporting tools.

outcomes.ol:
Build a moderate MVC web application using a suitable framework
Setup a suitable webapp development environment
Build a basic MVC webapp
Build a moderately complex webapp

Build distributed capabilities into an MVC web application
Use common representation protocols for distributed systems
Use common transport protocols for distributed systems
Use common application protocols for distributed systems

Demonstrate proper team collaboration for webapp development
Use collaborative workflow to develop a webapp
Use a shared code repository to develop a webapp
